price: Nta cyo bajya bavuga batagitegetswe (na Allah), kandi bubahiriza itegeko rye.
arabic: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yasbiqūnahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi yaʿmalūna
